title: Interpretation of seeing a headdress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a head covering in a dream: A head covering can be a veil, a veil, or a veil for a woman, and it is an obligation for every Muslim, and to see it in a dream shows the good reputation and marriage of the girl and shows the man the high status and position of the unmarried young man and the unmarried woman, as well as the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the widow, This is by presenting the interpretation of the vision of autumn for some imams, such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and other modern-day interpreters. Follow us on the Vision website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a head covering in a dream? Seeing an elegant and clean hairstyle in a dream indicates success. And success and fairness of the situation for the viewer. Seeing a dirty or torn head covering indicates loss of property and failure. Seeing a black head covering indicates a good ruler and bears witness to the testimony of truth, just as a black veil indicates strength of character, a good life, abundant livelihood, and marital happiness. Taking off the veil in a dream indicates committing Sins and transgressions. What is the interpretation of seeing a colored veil in a dream? Seeing a black veil in a dream for a married woman indicates many marital problems and disputes and may indicate the high status and position of the husband. Seeing a white veil indicates a safe and stable life, purity of breasts and good character. Colored veil for pregnant women indicates The closest birth and happiness of the baby. If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing a hijab, it indicates the passage of pregnancy and the comfort of childbirth. Seeing the purchase of a new colored hijab in a married woman’s dream indicates happy news and the renewal of her life and may indicate pregnancy. What is the interpretation of a dream about an offering for a single woman? Seeing a white veil or a white scarf For a single woman, this indicates that she heard good news, peace, and psychological stability, as it indicates her marriage to a pious young man. Seeing a dirty veil in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a bad reputation and many sins and transgressions. Seeing a white veil with golden patterns in a girl’s dream announces receiving an inheritance. What Interpretation of a dream about wearing a hijab for an unmarried woman? Seeing a hijab or veil in an unmarried woman’s dream remembers her short marriage to a young man of good character. Taking off the hijab or something else, strangers, or in the streets expresses anxiety and sadness. Taking off the hijab or veil for a girl in a dream announces the goodness of charity and its abundance in secret. See Embroidered scarfIt indicates good morals and the large amount of money that you will receive. Washing the hijab in a dream It indicates a good reputation, a good conduct, and the end of worry and anxiety. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman without a hijab in a dream? Seeing a married woman wearing a hijab indicates an imminent pregnancy and also indicates happiness and stability. Family. Seeing a veil indicates problems, marital disputes, and worries. Seeing a veil for a married woman indicates the presence of problems and psychological pressures. What is the interpretation of a man’s dream of wearing a veil? Seeing a man covering his head with a veil or scarf indicates a prestigious job or promotion, as well as the high status that the dreamer enjoys. If a man sees That he covers his head in the street, indicates

title: Recurring dreams in a dream, what does this mean?

preview.html: It also looks good if the vision is good, and some people are affected by their psychological state in visions and dreams. If they are sad, they see good and bad things in their dreams. Is dream repetition beneficial to the dreamer? Many dreamers ask about repeating their dreams or visions in the dream. If the scene is good, then it It appears good. If it contains evil, then this indicates the evil that will befall him or the dreamer in his life. Many dreamers ask how to distinguish between a good dream, or someone who gives him good in his life, and a dream that shows problems in the fortuneteller’s life. There are also some Visions that affect the dreamer psychologically and make him think a lot about negative things in his life. If an unmarried woman sees herself repeatedly getting married to someone she did not know in the dream, then the dream here foretells that the dreamer will get married. If the dream is repeated over short periods and the unmarried woman remembers it In these periods. Although he also remembers the person he married in the dream. But if he does not remember the person he married in the dream, he only remembers that he was getting married. Here the dream refers to the psychology of an unmarried pregnant woman and her great thought about marriage is important in this The right time in her life. The right person is expected to get engaged or get married. Seeing a loss in a recurring dream indicates the loss of something that he will face in his life during this period. If the dream is repeated in which there are many losses for many of the dreamer’s personal things, this indicates that there is something very important that the dreamer will lose. What if the loss in the dream is repeated in the same thing for the dreamer and it was one thing in the dream and it did not change. This indicates that he will truly lose this thing in his life and lose it. Here the dream shows that the dreamer must pay attention to this loss and not let it have a bad effect on him. See also Interpretation of a dream about a dream about marriage: Repeating a dream within a dream: Many dreamers see visions in their dreams in different forms, but the meaning is the same for them and does not differ in the dream: If the dream refers to good things, this indicates that the dream is repeated for the pioneer. It shows that he will find many things Good things in his life. Some visions are sad or have a sad meaning in the dream and are repeated to the dreamer over short periods. It could indicate the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through during this period. He is suffering from the pressures that he is going through at this time in his life. And if the dreamer is She is free, and she saw the presence of intense fear in her sleep, and she saw the dream repeating for long periods, but the details of the dream were repeated to her. Here the meaning appears that there is something that this single woman is afraid of at this time in her life. He tried to escape from it or get rid of it, but he could not. It also indicates The dreamer who works and sees a recurring dream of losing work and losing money, and it has been repeated with him in very close periods at this time in his life. Here it could indicate that there are people trying to make him lose all the things that he has in his life or that he cares about at the present time. And as Ibn Sirin said that seeing a dream often belongs to the one who sees it in life.It is

title: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream on the Moments website. If he has money, he must pay zakat on his money. If he dreams that he has defecated a lot while on a trip, then he is not traveling and his path is blocked. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted insight into collecting feces in a dream as an indication of the person’s marriage. As for the farmer’s insight about feces in a dream, it is good news. Pleasant for everyone, because it indicates the harvest of his seed. When a seller sees feces in his dream, it means abundant profit from trade and abundance of sustenance. A student’s insightful look at feces in a dream indicates success in his studies. Also, seeing a poor person in feces in a dream indicates a shift in circumstances. For him, it is optimal. Regarding collecting feces and storing them in a certain place, this is evidence that the dreamer has a good reputation among people. Watching the storage of feces in a dream also indicates the coming of relief after distress and happiness after a long period of sadness. Read also: Interpretation of seeing fire In a dream, the interpretation of seeing feces in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Seeing feces in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi interprets it as an abundant provision of goodness and the arrival of joy and happiness to the pioneer. Also, feces in a dream is evidence of the release of worries and sorrows after a short period. Seeing the dreamer defecating is evidence that he is going through pain. And troubles, but they will disappear after a stage. The awareness of defecating in an unknown place indicates that the dreamer rules people’s needs and benefits. The awareness of defecating in a remote place such as a valley gains power or status in one’s life. Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting on a chair in a dream Sitting on a chair In a dream, it means owning lawful money such as an inheritance. As for the insight of sitting on animal droppings, this indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of money along the way. Seeing the feces of an infant in a dream is good news about goodness reaching the dreamer. When the dreamer sees in a dream The excrement of a baby girl, this is a sign that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and sustenance. Interpretation of seeing excrement in a dream for a patient: Seeing a patient excrement in a dream while he is suffering from an acute disease, this indicates his recovery from that disease. The appearance of the patient in a dream also indicates that he has health and well-being from the disease. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a single woman. For an unmarried woman’s vision in a dream, feces is evidence that she is getting food and has heard happy news about her. It also indicates the insight of feces in a single girl’s dream to relieve worries and sorrows. Also, seeing feces in a dream of an unmarried woman A married woman means that she will win an excellent position at work. When an unmarried woman sees that she is actually defecating in her clothes, this is evidence that she has met someone who is not suitable for her. Insight, the unmarried woman, defecates in the toilet to show that she is a pure girl. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a married woman, and Insight for a married woman in a dream It is the stool allocated to her, this indicates that happiness will come to her and her family. As for the married woman’s insight that her partner is defecating in the toilet.

title: Interpretation of seeing naked in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing naked people in a dream is the subject of this article. Naked or nude is defined as taking off clothes and showing many parts of a person’s body or showing all parts of his body, and the dream of seeing naked is one of the common dreams that many people dream of, and in general such a dream. The dream shows the emergence of a scandal or the emergence of what was hidden, or the emergence of many problems and various other signs, and scholars differ in interpreting visions and dreams in interpreting seeing a dream naked. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Whoever sees that he is exposing his body with the intention of being naked shows that the person is not good at dealing With people. Whoever sees that he is covered up so that the world does not see him naked, declares his good morals and that he is a just and pious man. The person who sees himself asking people to cover themselves indicates trouble and crisis for the one who saw this dream. Seeing a naked person alone in a dream shows that this person does not trust himself or He is satisfied with his actions.Interpretation of seeing naked in a dreamInterpretation of seeing naked in a dreamSeeing a naked or nude dream can indicate committing sins or showing what is deliberately hidden, whether in words or actions. This vision also indicates the emergence of rebellion and sin, as happened to Adam when he ate From the tree and his nakedness appeared to him, and the vision of the naked may be interpreted as a lack of money. However, if one sees that he is hiding from the nakedness, it may indicate marriage or repentance, or it may indicate a solution to the problem and an agreement. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead. Interpretation of the vision of the naked by Ibn SirinWhen it is revealed The human body in a dream, this is a sign of scandal and what is hidden is revealed with uncertainty. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing naked people in a dream indicates psychological disturbance and problems at work. Interpretation of seeing a naked man by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi mentioned in his interpretation that seeing naked people in a dream is an indication of a person’s feeling of remorse. In another saying: Whoever sees himself not wearing clothes, this indicates hostility towards someone. But if someone sees someone naked and seeks help from people to cover him, then the visionary will be vulnerable to bankruptcy and loss of money. And if the dreamer is a good person and sees himself naked in a dream, All of this is a sign of the coming of goodness in this world and religion. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream for a married woman. The vision in this case is interpreted according to the married woman’s personality. If she is religious, it indicates repentance to God. If a married woman sees that she is asking for help In covering up, this is evidence of problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream: If a man sees himself naked in a dream, this is a sign of his psychological disturbance and problems at work. But if he sees himself naked in the presence of others, this indicates that he is hiding something important, and this will appear. The matter will soon become public and will cause major problems. If you see him taking off all of his clothes, this indicates the loss of misfortunes and what disturbs the tranquility of life. You may be interested: Pregnancy in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream with different interpretations according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream has different interpretations. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, dawn occurs in the first minutes of the day and the most beautiful minutes. Today gives a lot of blessings and space to finish work. Seeing the time of dawn in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate blessings and goodness for the pioneer. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream, and different interpretations according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of dreams of seeing dawn in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing one’s time in a dream symbolizes Pain stops and freedom from problems and worries. In a dream, a person who is going to start a business indicates his success, the money he earns from it, and a lot of profits. Performing the dawn prayer in a dream is a good sign of the imminent fulfillment of a desire that the dreamer thought was unattainable. In a dream, a sick person appears Speedy recovery by order of God. Whoever dreams that he is an imam leading people in the dawn prayer, this is evidence of an upcoming trip to work or education. It indicates the sinner’s repentance and return to the path of truth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dawn call to prayer in a dream: This dream may come when the dreamer hears the sound of dawn prayer. Therefore, we explain the meaning of this dream in the following paragraph: Whoever dreams that he is calling for dawn, this is one of the best dreams that the dreamer sees in his sleep, because it indicates his high status, good behavior, and his willingness to obey God Almighty in his affairs. This world and the next. Whoever is single and sees this dream indicates a happy marriage soon and the birth of good offspring. The priest’s invitation to pray from the roof of his house is a sign of a disaster that has befallen the owner of that house and they must seek help from God to overcome it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the time of dawn in a dream for a single woman. We show Below are the meanings of a single woman who sees the time of dawn and prays in a dream. Her prayer: It indicates the appearance of goodness and blessings in her life in all her practical and personal affairs. Seeing the sunrise and sunset through the window portends that she will soon marry a good and prosperous person. Some scholars have suggested that the presence of this dream It symbolizes her obtaining a prestigious position or a promotion in her current job. The fact that a single woman prays indicates her good behavior among those around her and her willingness to obey God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dawn in a dream for a married woman: It indicates family stability, peace of mind, and the blessings God has bestowed upon her. And good. The dawning of the day before her eyes was an indication of an imminent pregnancy, especially for those who delayed their pregnancy. In the event that something saddens her, such as debt or marital strife, it ends by God’s will and her life turns into happiness and stability. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Fajr in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing a pregnant woman reading Surat Dawn in a dream indicates what Peaches is going through and her anxiety about the birth experience and her desire to be reassured about the safety of her fetus. It heralds the good news of the approaching date of her birth, and that it will be an easy matter by God’s command, and God will bless her with healthy and righteous offspring by God’s command. The time of dawn in a dream shows new beginnings. , achieving goals and plans, and that the dreamer has broad horizons and always strives for...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about repeated examination?

preview.html: The repetition of a certain dream in a dream is something that raises questions for some people, and this repetition raises their questions about the meaning of the dream that they want over and over again. Among these dreams is the dream of repeating seeing an examination in a dream. This thing definitely has an accurate interpretation, and through the following lines you will know what the interpretation is. Your dream? Interpretation of a dream about passing exams When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is taking an exam and was able to pass it and pass it, this is a sign of happiness and goodness that he will receive. If the fortuneteller is sick and sees that he has passed exams in a dream, this is good news for him that God will heal him in the near future. When an unmarried woman dreams that she has passed exams, this means that she will achieve all the goals that she planned in advance. If a single woman complains of distress and lack of money in reality and sees in his dream that he is taking an exam and can answer his questions and the result is that he excelled in the exam, then this vision confirms God will grant him abundant wealth from places that cannot be expected. Because he was patient with the suffering of the money crisis. When an unmarried woman sees that she has passed in a dream, this is evidence that she will soon be associated with a young man who has the qualifications that she has been looking for for a long time. For a married woman to see that she has passed exams in her dream, this is evidence of the stability of her life with her husband. And her children, and this vision tells her that God will bless her with kindness and a lot of money. When a pregnant woman sees that she has passed exams in a dream, this indicates that she has suffered from some troubles and problems in reality, but God will help her to overcome all these problems successfully. If the dreamer dreams of seeing The word “success” is written on a piece of paper in a dream, as this is evidence of his success in the matter he is currently trying to achieve. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation A dream of not preparing for exams: If an unmarried woman sees that she is inside the exam room and unfortunately she was not prepared or prepared for the exam, and this thing made her feel remorse and remorse in the dream, then this vision indicates that the single person in reality is performing some behaviors. And situations that make her completely dissatisfied with herself, as she seems to consider herself a reckless girl and not responsible for any responsibility, no matter how small. Feeling unable to answer exam questions in a dream is evidence that the dreamer does not care about himself and does not pay attention to anything important in life. His life. One jurist said that seeing an unmarried woman not ready to answer exam questions is evidence that she is not ready for marriage or engagement at this time. For a married woman to see that she is not ready for exams in her dream is evidence of the accumulation of responsibilities assigned to her, and in reality she does not know how to complete them. What are the ways in which she pleases her husband and children and ends household responsibilities without feeling pressure, if this vision shows many burdens on her?

title: Will the vision come true if it is interpreted?

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the purpose of dream interpretation and explain whether the vision will come true if it is interpreted, as well as a lot of interesting information.Does the vision come true if it is interpreted? Before answering the question of the article, will the vision come true if it is interpreted, it must be emphasized However, there is a big difference between a vision and a dream. A vision is from God Almighty and it is a good thing, good news, or a warning of something bad, and we can talk about its content to one of the righteous. While a dream is from Satan and the sleeper sees something hateful in it and should not be talked to. Or he is looking for something. An interpretation for him, rather he must seek refuge from him, then he spits on the left three times. Many questions arise about this topic, among them: Has the first interpretation of the dream come true even if it is not within human destiny? The first interpretation of Al-Rahmani’s vision, i.e. goodness, has already come true. , even if this interpretation is not possible or impossible, or if it is correct or wrong. As the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “Dreams fall according to what they express, and so is the example of the man who raised his legs and waited until he lowered them.” It is worth noting that the first interpretation For the vision, it is required to achieve an interpretation that depends on the rules of good vision interpretation and according to the symbols and meanings of the vision. Whereas if the interpretation is incorrect, not possible, or does not depend on the correct interpretive rules, it is not achieved. In other words, if the interpretation of the vision is wrong, it will not be achieved. Even if it was the first interpretation of the vision. The scholars confirmed the previous saying in the hadith of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, to Abu Bakr, may God be pleased with him, when he interpreted the vision in front of the Prophet: “An error in others.” Thus we answered the question of the article: Will the vision come true if it is interpreted and the answer is confirmed according to the Sunnah of the Prophet See also: When does the dream of an auspicious marriage come true? Does the dream come true if it is interpreted twice? After answering the question of the article: Does the vision come true if you interpret it, you must answer the question: The dream becomes reality if it is interpreted twice, and what interpretation comes true? The jurists confirmed that the vision is what is interpreted, And the interpreter’s interpretation and reconciliation have the value of vision. If the dreamer is interpreted as something he does not like and is not popular, then he should look for another interpreter or a knowledgeable person to explain it in the best way. If it is interpreted in a supportive way that rejects the harm, then he should be content with it and not look for an explanation or Another interpretation of it. Where the Messenger of God, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said: “O Aisha, if you convey a dream to a Muslim, and he expresses it in good terms, then the dream is as its owner expresses it.” Can a vision come true if it is interpreted with more than one interpretation? It has differed in terms of The matter is the opinions of jurists and interpreters, and there are many interpretations, we mention them as follows: Some commentators pointed out that the first interpretation of the vision is the one that will be achieved and no interpretation will be achieved after that. The supporters of this interpretation emphasized that fate facilitates the dream for the one who interprets it with the first interpretation until it comes true. This is based on a hadith. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “A vision depends on what it expresses.” This is an example of a man who raises his feet and waits when he puts them down. If he sees

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Perfume is a common vision that many of us see in our dreams. This perfume can be a gift, bought or sniffed somewhere. Also, perfume can appear in the dream of a married or married woman or man. Of course, every case in which perfume appears in a dream has many connotations and interpretations, as we will explain to you. Interpretation of the dream of seeing walking barefoot in a dream. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that attractive men’s perfume for an unmarried girl portends her imminent marriage to an elegant and attractive man. As for The female perfume that appears in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates the approaching marriage. If a married woman sees the scent of her traveling husband in a dream, this means that the husband will return to her in the near future. Ibn Shaheen says that the gift of perfume in a dream indicates the love that exists between the dreamer and the person. To whom the gift was given in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing wearing the niqab in a dream. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Kathir. If a married woman sees that her husband gives her an attractive perfume as a gift in a dream, this means that this husband treats the woman well, in contrast to the bad perfume that appears The husband’s bad mood with his wife. A beautiful perfume in a man’s dream indicates a lot of money that will come to him without effort or trouble in the coming period. The appearance of a beautiful glass of perfume in a dream indicates the good reputation and love of people that the dreamer enjoys. Interpretation of the dream when you see Wearing long clothes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that a beautiful smell indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life, unlike a bad smell that indicates negative changes in the coming period. Breaking a perfume bottle in a dream for a married woman indicates the death of the husband or the occurrence of... Separation between her and her husband through divorce. A pregnant woman who sees a male smell in a dream may give birth to a male child, while a female smell indicates that the child is female. A beautiful perfume in a dream indicates recovery from illness for those who suffer from any health problem. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a short man In a dream. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirms that the beautiful and attractive smell in a dream indicates the arrival of happy occasions and news on the dreamer’s path. As for the unpleasant, unpleasant smell of the dreamer, it indicates that the dreamer has entered a difficult phase full of conflicts and problems. If An unmarried girl saw in her dream that she is buying the perfume she loves, so this is good news for her that she will marry the man she wants. As for breaking a perfume bottle for the fiancée, it means her separation from her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a skinny girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Al-Saidi says that perfumes Expensive indicates the wealth of the dreamer or the acquisition of a large inheritance in the coming period. Al-Saidi says that whoever sees himself spraying perfume on his clothes will buy a lot of new clothes in the near future. As for putting perfume on your hands in the dream, this indicates that you will get a lot of money without spending any c

title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin letter S

preview.html: It is known that the letter S carries the fourteenth row of the alphabet, in addition to that many words in the Arabic language begin with this letter, including prayer, fasting, patience, and others. Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin. Letter S. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the letter S in a dream. could be evidence of... The collapse of all worries and the end of all sorrows that the dreamer is experiencing in the near future. It was also suggested that he sees a dream with the letter S in a dream. It may be a sign that God Almighty will bless the dreamer with an abundance of goodness in the near future. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dream with the letter S in a dream. It could be evidence of the dreamer’s recovery from the disease that causes him suffering for a long time, God willing. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a dream with the letter S in a dream. It may be a sign that God Almighty will comfort the dreamer who is suffering from distress or crisis in the very near future. Also It was mentioned that seeing the letter S in a dream. Perhaps this is evidence that the viewer seeks to get closer to God Almighty for His satisfaction and mercy. See also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin. Letter L. Interpretation of the letter S in a dream. It is said that seeing the letter S in a dream concerns Ibn Sirin. It may be A sign that the monarch is walking in the wrong path and straying from the path of truth and justice, and therefore he must be careful. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing a dream with the letter S in a dream. It may be evidence that the dreamer is not living an uncomfortable and unstable life and is suffering from some difficulties and obstacles. It was also suggested that seeing the letter S in a dream means shouting. This may be a sign that the fortuneteller will obtain a high status and great respect among people. It was said that seeing the letter S in a dream may be a sign that there are some jealous and spiteful people around the viewer, so it should To be careful. Ibn Sirin also says that seeing a dream with the letter S in a dream was a boy. This may be a sign that the fortuneteller will hear a lot of good news very soon. Interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dream about prayer in a dream. Can It is evidence that the dreamer is walking on the path of righteousness, piety, and drawing closer to God Almighty. It is also said that seeing prayer in a dream in a dream. It could be evidence that the dreamer wants to pray all the prayers in the mosque. Seeing a dream of prayer in a dream refers to Ibn Shirin. Whoever prayed a humiliating prayer. That the dreamer should be keen to please God Almighty and hold on to his sleep tightly. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing a dream about praying in a dream was considered impurity. This may be a sign that the viewer will be afflicted with some diseases in the near future. Seeing a dream about praying in A dream about riding a monster indicates that the viewer is always in a state of fear and panic, which could be caused by a violent psychological crisis. Ibn Sirin narrated that he dreamed of seeing a dream of praying in a dream, and he was praying what he lacked. This may be a sign that the dreamer may face Some problems in his life. He dreamed of seeing a dream about prayer in a dream, and he prayed on Friday night, it symbolizes. This may be a sign that God

title: Learn about the interpretation of mountains in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Mountains in a dream. Interpreters believe that the dream indicates goodness and carries many omens for the pioneer, but it also indicates some negative connotations in some cases. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing mountains for single, married people. And the pregnant woman and the male according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Mountains in a dream. Seeing mountains in a dream means that the dreamer is facing some problems in the current period of his life. The dream brings him good news about victory over his enemies and the withdrawal of his rights from them in the very near future. If the dreamer sees the disappearance of the mountains, the vision It portends the term of office of the president of the country in which he lives, for the needy and help for the poor and needy. Mountains in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing mountains is a good thing, it indicates that the dreamer has high aspirations and is trying with all his might to achieve them. For this person soon. The white mountain in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will experience a happy event in the coming period, and seeing the yellow mountain predicts that the dreamer will soon enjoy peace of mind and stability after a long period of stress and psychological distress. But if the dreamer sees the mountain in his dream and feels fear or insecurity, this indicates that he is going through a major crisis at the present time and cannot get out of it. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it. Google and get the correct interpretations. Mountains in a single woman’s dream. Seeing mountains for unmarried women brings news of a close marriage to a wealthy man who works in a wonderful job and belongs to an ancient family, and her success in her career and the achievement of her goals soon. If the dreamer is engaged and dreams of climbing mountains, but with difficulty, she will face many Of the obstacles, this means that she faces many problems that delay her marriage, and if the dreamer sees herself descending from the mountain, the dream indicates that she will get rid of them. From her psychological pressures, she will enjoy comfort and stability soon. Interpretation of dreams about mountains and waterfalls for single women. The girl who sees mountains and waterfalls in her dreams interprets her vision as the presence of many special things that rejoice her heart and make her life better, God willing. Whoever sees this must be optimistic about the good and expect the best in the future because what It will come is something special for her. Many jurists also pointed out that seeing mountains and waterfalls in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that indicate the presence of many special things that are happening to her in her life and confirms that she will get a lot of money very soon, and it is a very special vision for her. Interpretation of a dream about green mountains for a single woman: If a girl sees green mountains in her dream, this means that she is doing everything in her power to obtain the approval of God Almighty, and it is one of the dreamer’s distinctive visions about her. If the dreamer sees that the green mountains in her dream are without water, this means that she will be exposed to injustice. Great and harmful damage from someone stronger than her, and a confirmation of her desire to take revenge on him in any way
